name: PJ the DJ
storyline: One day PJ was DJ'ing as per usual but he got distracted by a doughnut laying right beside him. Instead of being responsible and ignoring it he instead reached for the doughnut, tripped on something, and somehow managed to miraculously burn down the entire nightclub he works at. Because of this incident his DJ'ing license was revoked and he's now jobless. For the first time in this teddy bear's life he has actual drive and motivation so he sets out to prove to the world how good of a DJ he is in hopes of getting his job back.
summary: A Parappa the Rapper fan game starring the character PJ Berri
